title: python setup.py build fails after commit 9169f60
body_html:
After the commit Parallelize TensorMethods.cpp builds python setup.py build fails on both ppc64 and x64 server (i.e. with lots of CPU cores) machines with the following messages:

x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc: error: /home/brosa/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/TensorDouble.cpp: No such file or directory
x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc: fatal error: no input files
compilation terminated.
x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc -pthread -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O2 -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -fno-strict-aliasing -Wdate-time -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -g -fdebug-prefix-map=/build/python2.7-ZZaKJ6/python2.7-2.7.13=. -fs
tack-protector-strong -Wformat -Werror=format-security -fPIC -I/home/brosa/pytorch -I/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/csrc -I/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/lib/t
mp_install/include/TH -I/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THPP -I/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/include -I/usr/incl
ude/python2.7 -c /home/brosa/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/TensorFloat.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/TensorFloat.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings
-DWITH_NUMPY
error: command 'x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' failed with exit status 1
x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc: error: /home/brosa/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/TensorFloat.cpp: No such file or directory
x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc: fatal error: no input files
compilation terminated.

This does not seem to happen when running python setup.py build develop.
I am building on ppc64le VM with 16 cores and a x64 bare-metal machine with 20 cores.

body:
After the commit `Parallelize TensorMethods.cpp builds`  `python setup.py build` fails on both ppc64 and x64 server (i.e. with lots of CPU cores) machines with the following messages:

```
x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc: error: /home/brosa/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/TensorDouble.cpp: No such file or directory
x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc: fatal error: no input files
compilation terminated.
x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc -pthread -DNDEBUG -g -fwrapv -O2 -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -fno-strict-aliasing -Wdate-time -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 -g -fdebug-prefix-map=/build/python2.7-ZZaKJ6/python2.7-2.7.13=. -fs
tack-protector-strong -Wformat -Werror=format-security -fPIC -I/home/brosa/pytorch -I/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/csrc -I/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include -I/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/lib/t
mp_install/include/TH -I/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THPP -I/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/include/THNN -I/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy/core/include -I/usr/incl
ude/python2.7 -c /home/brosa/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/TensorFloat.cpp -o build/temp.linux-x86_64-2.7/home/brosa/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/TensorFloat.o -D_THP_CORE -std=c++11 -Wno-write-strings
-DWITH_NUMPY
error: command 'x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc' failed with exit status 1
x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc: error: /home/brosa/pytorch/torch/csrc/generated/TensorFloat.cpp: No such file or directory
x86_64-linux-gnu-gcc: fatal error: no input files
compilation terminated.
```

This does not seem to happen when running `python setup.py build develop`.
I am building on ppc64le VM with 16 cores and a x64 bare-metal machine with 20 cores.
